analyzeThis

protected abstract void analyzeThis(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> readFields,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> modifiedFields,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> variables,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> functions)
This method must be implemented in every AST node.

Parameters:
readFields - return value - which fields are used (lowercase)
modifiedFields - return value - which fields are modified (lowercase)
variables - return value - which variables are used (lowercase)
functions - return value - which functions are used (lowercase)
